commit message: Access the property less. Instead use let.{}
Use a simple set function instead of a var
Changed the control flow. Let all commands go through the service. Put everything sleep related into its own class.
Get the test files from network. Takes a bit longer in tests but prevents shipping big files on each adb install.

Use a broadcast receiver to forward intents to the service and pass them also to the media session. Googles recommended way has the serious flaw that by declaring the filter in the manifest, every event will be catched by the service, regardless of mediaSession.setActive(false)
Inject the db name for simpler testing
Moved error propagation to the service, not the player.
Made the seek time an observable.
Made auto rewind amount an observable
Set sleep time and auto rewind amount from outsite so the player will be easier testable.
Propagate the updated book through the observable. This way clients can handle the book updating themself and testing is easier.
Move everything back to java package and remove false instrumentation runner
Let files test rely on files test
Converted test to kotlin and renamed test methods
Annotate the fun and delegate to the property so the tests will be correctly picked up
Moved logging stuff to own library
Rewritten image picker so it works as a simple crop helper.
Compile okhttp only in test modes
Thake the screenshot correctly and reset picassos cache.
Post events to the main thread so no manual observing on main thread is necessary.
Additional level ob abstraction to the database.
Correctly jump in tracks when previous / next buttons are pressed
Added an executor which will be used for future player commands.
Throw when call to player was not made on main thread.
Directly schedule the interval on the ui thread so we don't have to apply it on and on.
Way more ticks for playback position but distinct the position change
Use a behavior subject for the state so we can react easier to events.
Use the state to decide if we should update or not.
Correctly handle position updating and got rid of play pause as the media session can decide what to do based on the state we provided.
Dont subscribe on main thread as player always posts on main thread.
Use simple click listener instead of observables for clicks.
Create the test folder in setUp
Added product flavors for the min sdk
